response.overview: Melati Inn The Series tells the story of Melati (Alexandra Gottardo) who has supernatural understanding and reveals that a Dutch colonial inn has been cursed by the spirits of the dead.  Melati gains the power of eternal life from the curse and hopes to bring her dead son back to life.
response.tagline: Inn guests uncover the dark past and sinister plans of Madam Melati, the mysterious owner of Melati Inn.
response.title: Losmen Melati: The Series
